text: Paul Junger Witt (March 20, 1941 â€“ April 27, 2018) was an American movie and television producer. He produced such hit TV shows as Here Come the Brides, The Partridge Family, The Golden Girls, Soap, Benson, Empty Nest and Blossom. In movies, he was best known for producing Dead Poets Society. From 1983 until his death in 2018, Witt was married to screenwriter Susan Harris. Witt died of lymphoma in Los Angeles, California on April 27, 2018 at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Emmy Award winners Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from lymphoma Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:American television producers Category:Movie directors from New York City
title: Paul Junger Witt
